name: CHAYA
description:
CHAYA- A text based game where you fall into a city buried deep underground- you want to escape, but you need to make a few friends... and kill someone enemies. This game contains two games- both of which are free! In the first game, or 'chapter' you can get two endings: The good ending: Where you kill no one, and the bad ending: Where you kill.

You can choose which you pursue, but the next chapter has one ending: A good ending. Keep your eyes out for CHAYA 2: The dying  surface!

Stay alive children... for one wrong move, and...

You'll go back to your most recent save.

Twine link:http://twinery.org/2/#!/stories/83edfb36-a196-4a35-a44c-13b2dbb410b8/play
